```{r include=FALSE}
library(tigris)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(broom)
library(purrr)
library(scales)
library(readr)
```


```{r}

homicides <- read_csv("data/homicide-data.csv")
ca_homi <- homicides %>%
  filter(state == "CA") %>%
  mutate(disposition = str_replace_all(disposition, "Open/No arrest", "unsolved"),
         disposition = str_replace_all(disposition, "Closed without arrest", "unsolved"),
         disposition = str_replace_all(disposition, "Closed by arrest", "solved"))
          
         
         
data("state")
us_state_info <- data_frame(state = state.name, 
                            area = state.area,
                            region = state.region)  

ca_counties <- counties(state = "CA", cb = TRUE, class = "sf")

ca_homicides <- ca_counties %>%
  rename(city = NAME) %>%
  right_join(ca_homi, by = "city") %>%
  select(city, state, victim_race, lat, lon, disposition, geometry)
```

.
```{r}
ca_homicides %>%
ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = ca_counties) + 
  geom_point(data = ca_homicides, aes(x = ca_homicides$lon, y = ca_homicides$lat, color = ca_homicides$victim_race)) + 
  facet_wrap( ~ city)
```

```{r}
ca_homicides %>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = ca_homicides) +
  geom_point(aes(x = lat , y = lon, color = victim_race)) + 
  facet_wrap(~city)
```
